Articles.Content: Hello friends I put this thread to inform me if anybody know when is scheduled the launch of the new version of KSP (0.22) because I can not stand the anxiety lol. And while we're on step ask if anyone knows the official release date of the final game. Thank you and Happy Missions!

Soon.

Seriously, not even the devs know when it'll be released.
Is this, a question asking about a release date??? Wait... It is... NOOOOOO! Now it's pushed back another day!!

Best answer here is, *AHEM*

"It'll be ready when it's bloody ready, alright!"

All I can tell for sure is :

Final game will be released after v0.22.

Hope it helps.

The devs don't release release dates as they don't want to disappoint fans if/when they overrun. With regards to the final release, as was stated in an interview with Harvester, they treat every release as if it could be the last release, and so there's no over-arching plan on when the final version will be ready (I'm sure they have sketched an outline of what could be a release schedule, but there's nothing hard coded and released to have a target date to aim at).

They have a feature list where by when they get everything on that list into the game then that would be ver 1.0

They have been having a problem with "feature creep" meaning they had been an ever expanding list of features... Finally they decided to draw the line somewhere. This list is not public and how long it will take to finish it is unknown to them as well as us. And of course everything is subject to change as life is unpredictable.
They have said that it will be forever expanding. Also whenever someone asks for the release date, They push the release back one day.

KSP currently has no official projected launch date for final release or alpha builds. As I'm sure you've heard many-a-time in the past, the release date is when it's done, and not a moment sooner.

That said, closing this, as you have an answer.
